verses.name: Genesis 30:6
verses.text: And Rachel said, God hath judged me, and hath also heard my voice, and hath given me a son: therefore called she his name Dan.

verses.name: Genesis 30:7
verses.text: And Bilhah Rachel’s maid conceived again, and bare Jacob a second son.

verses.name: Genesis 30:8
verses.text: And Rachel said, With great wrestlings have I wrestled with my sister, and I have prevailed: and she called his name Naphtali.

verses.name: Genesis 30:9
verses.text: When Leah saw that she had left bearing, she took Zilpah her maid, and gave her Jacob to wife.

verses.name: Genesis 30:10
verses.text: And Zilpah Leah’s maid bare Jacob a son.

verses.name: Genesis 30:11
verses.text: And Leah said, A troop cometh: and she called his name Gad.
